headline: Make Father's Day Extra Special with Kroger
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR), America's grocer, today shared how customers can celebrate dad with random acts of kindness leading up to Father's Day. From a delicious meal on the grill to a basket of hot sauce and cold beverages, dad deserves the extra love and appreciation this holiday.

headline: Companies Quietly Water Down Climate Claims in Latest Investor Reports
summary: Some references to emissions reduction and other environmental efforts are being purged ahead of annual shareholder meetings.

headline: Harbor AlphaEdge Large Cap Value ETF Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: During Q1, the Harbor AlphaEdge Large Cap Value ETF returned 0.98% (NAV), slightly underperforming the Harbor AlphaEdge Large Cap Value Index.

headline: Kroger Stock Is Cheap. Buy It Ahead of Earnings.
summary: After an early 2025 run, shares have fallen about 9% from their April high. But there’s nothing wrong with Kroger
